# security-review.yaml
name: security-review
description: Security Review ×œ×¤× ×™ Production Deploy
agent: architect
inputs:
  - story_id
  - code_changes
  - dependencies
steps:
  - check_vulnerabilities
  - review_authentication
  - check_data_encryption
  - validate_input_sanitization
  - review_authorization
outputs:
  - security_report
  - issues_list
  - approval_status
